document_data.caption: A map showing Blackstar Lane branching south off of Spiderweb Alley.
document_data.name: Blackstar Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Blackstar Lane''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Blackstar Lane connected [[Snail Street]] with [[Gut Alley]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], branching due west from Snail Street and merging with Gut Alley a few buildings south of [[Leera's Alley]]. Both [[Three Daggers Alley]] and [[Dust Alley]] connected to the south side of Blackstar Lane.
document_data.Notable Locations: [[The Blackstar Inn]] was located at the intersection of Blackstar Lane and Gut Alley.
